column6: desc
Unit from type mage > warrior get a 50% attack bonus on units from type mage.
Unit from type warrior > skill get a 50% attack bonus on units from type warrior.
Unit from type skill > mage get a 50% attack bonus on units from type skill.
Unit from type warrior > mage get a 25% attack bonus on units from type warrior in the night.
Unit from type skill > warrior get a 25% attack bonus on units from type skill in the night.
Unit from type mage > skill get a 25% attack bonus on units from type mage in the night.
Unit from element fire > earth get a 25% attack bonus on units from element fire.
Unit from element earth > water get a 25% attack bonus on units from element earth.
Unit from element water > air get a 25% attack bonus on units from element water.
Unit from element air > fire get a 25% attack bonus on units from element air.
Unit from element earth > fire get a 15% attack bonus on units from element earth in the morning.
Unit from element water > earth get a 15% attack bonus on units from element water in the morning.
Unit from element air > water get a 15% attack bonus on units from element air in the morning.
Unit from element fire > air get a 15% attack bonus on units from element fire in the morning.
Unit from movement type swim > float get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type swim.
Unit from movement type float > walk get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type float.
Unit from movement type walk > fly get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type walk.
Unit from movement type fly > swim get a 30% attack bonus on units from the movement type fly.
Unit from movement type swim > fly get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type swim in the afternoon.
Unit from movement type float > swim get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type float in the afternoon.
Unit from movement type walk > float get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type walk in the afternoon.
Unit from movement type fly > walk get a 15% attack bonus on units from the movement type fly in the afternoon.
Unit with the ethos good > bad get a 25% attack bonus on units from the ethos good.
Unit with the ethos bad > neutral get a 25% attack bonus on units from the ethos bad.
Unit with the ethos neutral > good get a 25% attack bonus on units from the ethos neutral.
Unit with the ethos bad > good get a -25% attack malus on units from the ethos bad.
Unit with the ethos neutral > bad get a -25% attack malus on units from the ethos neutral.
Unit with the ethos good > neutral get a -25% attack malus on units from the ethos good.
